snippet.title: Hide Time: Chapter One - Release Trailer (OUT NOW!)
snippet.description:
●════════════════════════════●

Hide Time: Chapter One is now out for FREE on Steam and Gamejolt!
Spread the news and go play the game!
We have been working on this project for 12 whole months and we are extremely
happy to finally release it for you all to play

Go have fun! :D

Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/3131800/Hide_Time/
Gamejolt - https://gamejolt.com/games/HideTime/913886

●════════════════════════════●

Our socials: https://linktr.ee/Midnight_Games2023
Join the Hide Time Discord server: https://discord.gg/XsTMfSH6wr

●════════════════════════════●

#spookygames #steamgame #videogames #videogame #mascothorrorgame #storydrivengames #storydrivengame #game #games #gaming #gamers #creep #freegame #horrorstory
